Summary

Students will create a program that uses variables, conditionals, and relational expressions to write a historical narrative in Twine based on events and topics related to Westward Expansion. Students will choose a project from a choice board and test their products regularly throughout construction. Their programs should include multiple outcomes based on the userâ€™s choices or actions.
